title: Housing Market Crash
desc:
Post 83
- Rents of $150 or above are reduced by 25%.
- Rents of $300 or above are reduced by 50%.
- Rents of $450 or above are reduced by 75%.
- Rents of $700 or above are completely negated.
- Rents of $1000 or above turn negative and are reduced by 80%.
- Lasts for this round and the 3 next ones.
